Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Victoria Beatrix Reiter at a charity gala in Vienna. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Having worked for over 23 years, Victoria Beatrix Reiter brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Victoria Beatrix Reiter has been happily married to Schwarz since 2011. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Victoria received her secondary school diploma from Akademisches Gymnasium Innsbruck in 1997.
In 2002, Victoria graduated from Modul University Vienna with a degree.
Occupation History:
Victoria Beatrix Reiter is a 47 year old Investment Director from Austria.
Victoria Beatrix Reiter began her professional journey as a Analyst at B&C Private Equity GmbH in 2002, laying the foundation for future success.
At Quadriga Capital GmbH, she held the position of Associate from 2007 to 2010, making significant contributions to the organization.
She spent 14 years working as a Investment Director at Quadriga Capital GmbH, refining her expertise and building a strong network.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 290000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She owns townhouse in Gmunden, where she resides. It is worth 890000 EUR.

In 2005, she received an inheritance of 7030000 EUR from her late grandfather, who was a prominent Oil and Gas Executive, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome her as a new client.
